description:
Pecorine finally confronts the Omniscient Kaiser, joining forces with Kokkoro and Yuuki, who come to aid her in the fight. Karyl finds herself torn between her loyalty to the Kaiser and her bonds with the Gourmet Guild members. As their feelings clash, the battle enters its final phase. Yuuki, Pecorine, Karyl, and Kokkoro—what future will the Gourmet Guild choose...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Connecting the Pieces with You Once More
Mou Ichido, Kimi to Tsunagaru Monogatari
もう一度, キミとつながる物語
